title: Build Employee Task Manager Web Application

requirements.text: Implement secure employee authentication system with email and password login using Internet Identity integration, token-based session management, and role-based access control that restricts employees to their designated features
acceptanceCriteria: Employees can log in securely with credentials
Sessions are maintained with secure tokens
Unauthorized access to restricted features is prevented

requirements.text: Create employee dashboard that displays summary of assigned tasks, pending tasks count, notifications list, and current work status overview with quick navigation to all main modules
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard shows task summary on load
Pending tasks are clearly counted and displayed
Notifications are visible and accessible
Quick links to main features work correctly

requirements.text: Build task management module where employees can view their assigned task list, see detailed task information, update task status between Pending/In Progress/Completed, add notes or comments to tasks, and upload related images

quotes: Update task status (Pending, In Progress, Completed)

acceptanceCriteria: Task list displays all assigned tasks for logged-in employee
Task detail view shows complete task information
Status can be changed between the three states
Notes can be added and saved to tasks
Images can be uploaded and associated with tasks

requirements.text: Implement time tracking system with clock in and clock out functionality that records timestamps, displays daily work hour summary, shows weekly time overview, and stores all time logs with employee association
acceptanceCriteria: Employees can clock in to start work session
Employees can clock out to end work session
Daily hours are calculated and displayed accurately
Weekly time summary aggregates all work sessions
All timestamps are recorded with proper timezone handling

requirements.text: Create scheduling module that displays daily schedule view, weekly schedule overview, assigned work locations, and upcoming task schedule with dynamic data fetching
acceptanceCriteria: Daily view shows current day's scheduled items
Weekly view displays full week schedule
Work locations are clearly indicated for each schedule item
Future scheduled tasks are visible and organized

requirements.text: Build messaging and notifications system that allows employees to receive messages from managers, view all notifications, reply to messages, and receive task-related alerts
acceptanceCriteria: Employees can view received messages
Notification list shows all alerts and updates
Reply functionality works for two-way communication
Task alerts are triggered and displayed appropriately

requirements.text: Implement employee onboarding module that supports submission of personal information, uploading of required forms (W-4, I-9), uploading identification documents, digital signature capture, and onboarding progress tracking
acceptanceCriteria: Personal information form can be filled and submitted
W-4 and I-9 forms can be uploaded
ID documents upload with validation
Digital signature can be captured and saved
Progress tracker shows completion status of onboarding steps

requirements.text: Create employee profile management section that displays employee name, contact details, job title, company assignment, and role, while explicitly preventing access to payroll information

quotes: Payroll details remain restricted and inaccessible

acceptanceCriteria: Profile displays all basic employee information
Contact details are visible and formatted correctly
Job title and company assignment are shown
Payroll data is not accessible or visible to employees

requirements.text: Design responsive progressive web app interface optimized for mobile browsers with structured navigation flow including Login Screen, Dashboard, and main navigation tabs for Tasks, Time Clock, Schedule, Messages, and Profile

quotes: responsive web-based task manager that works great on mobile browsers
Main Navigation Tabs: Tasks, Time Clock, Schedule, Messages, Profile

acceptanceCriteria: Application is fully responsive on mobile devices
Navigation structure follows the specified flow
All five main tabs are accessible from navigation
UI works seamlessly in mobile browsers
Touch interactions are optimized for mobile use

requirements.text: Apply a modern, professional design system throughout the application with a cohesive visual theme featuring clean typography, intuitive layouts, and a color palette appropriate for enterprise task management software that maintains consistency across all modules
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design is professional and enterprise-appropriate
Typography is readable and consistent
Layout patterns are intuitive and user-friendly
Color scheme is cohesive across all screens
Design maintains consistency throughout all features

constraints: Application must be built as a web application using React, not React Native
Backend must use Motoko on the Internet Computer, not localhost REST APIs
Authentication must integrate with Internet Identity, not traditional email/password
Employees must not have access to payroll information or system settings
Employees cannot view other employees' confidential information
Employees cannot assign tasks to others
